name: Position
description: Secure context This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers. The Position interface represents the position of the concerned device at a given time. The position, represented by a Coordinates object, comprehends the 2D position of the device, on a spheroid representing the Earth, but also its altitude and its speed.

members.name: Position.coords
members.description: Returns a Coordinates object defining the current location.

members.name: Position.timestamp
members.description: Returns a DOMTimeStamp representing the time at which the location was retrieved.
